resources.string: Loaded local known and followed tags.
Continue playing media in the background after closing picture-in-picture mode
Default quality when using mobile data
Dark mode setting (applies when exiting this Settings UI)
Participate in the data network (requires app and background service restart)
Send buffering events to Odysee servers
You have not created a channel yet. Create a new channel first in order to access Creator Settings.
Mininum time gap in seconds between comments (affects livestream chat as well)
Channels with a lifespan lower than the specified duration will not be able to comment on your content. Examples: 30m, 6h, 14d, 2M
Minimum credits tip amount for comments
Enabling a minimum amount to comment will force all comments, including livestreams, to have tips associated with them. This can help prevent spam.
Minimum credits tip amount for hyperchats
Enabling a minimum amount to hyperchat will force all TIPPED comments to have this value in order to be shown. This still allows regular comments to be posted.
Moderators can block channels on your behalf. Blocked channels will appear in your "Blocked and Muted" list.
Comments and livestream chat containing these words will be blocked.

Use this wallet address to receive credits sent by another user (or yourself).
You can generate a new address at any time, and any previous addresses will continue to work. Using multiple addresses can be helpful for keeping track of incoming payments from multiple sources.
An Odysee account allows you to earn rewards, backup your wallet, and keep everything in sync.
Without an account, you assume all responsibility for securing your wallet and Odysee data.

resources.string: By creating an account, you agree to our terms and confirm you are over the age of 13.
An email has been sent to
Please click the link in the message to complete signing in.
Please enter a valid email address
Please enter a valid email address and a password.
An unknown error occurred during signup. Please try again.
Please follow the instructions in the email sent to your address to continue.
You have successfully signed in to Odysee
An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
Please enter the password you used to secure your wallet.
Please enter a password to secure your wallet.
Note: for wallet security purposes, Odysee is unable to reset your wallet password.
The wallet sync operation could not be completed at this time. Please try again later. If this problem persists, please send an email to hello@odysee.com.
This account must undergo review before you can participate in the rewards program. This can take anywhere from several minutes to several days.
You can get instantly verified to be able to participate in the rewards program using your Twitter account or skipping the manual verification queue.
Get instantly verified using your Twitter account. Your Twitter email address must match the email that you provided and your account should be active.
This build of Odysee does not have Twitter verification support available.
Get instantly verified using your phone number.
Skip the manual verification queue by paying a fee in order to start participating in the rewards program immediately.
This build of Odysee does not have paid verification support available.
If you previously completed a purchase successfully and you still see this screen, please tap the verify purchase button below.
No purchase was found for this account.
Please request to be verified on the official Odysee Discord server. A manual review can take anywhere from several minutes to several days.
Please enjoy free content in the meantime!

Confirmation process takes a few minutes, but then you can go live anytime. The stream is not shown anywhere until you are broadcasting.

resources.string: LBRY is a free, open, and community-run digital marketplace. It is a decentralized peer-to-peer content distribution platform for creators to upload and share content, and earn LBRY credits for their effort. Users will be able to find a wide selection of videos, music, ebooks and other digital content they are interested in.
You can interact with the LBRY team and members of the community on Discord, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter or Reddit.
The lbrynet.log file could not be found.
